recipe.title: Orecchiette with Salsa Cruda and Ricotta
ingredients: 2 small garlic cloves, forced through a garlic press
instructions: Stir together all ingredients except pasta and ricotta in a large bowl with 3/4 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper. Let stand, stirring occasionally, 20 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook orecchiette in a pasta pot of boiling salted water (3 tablespoons salt for 6 qt water) until al dente.
Drain pasta and toss with tomato salsa. Season with salt and pepper and dollop with ricotta.
